featured.text: The fashion soon spread beyond the circle of the nobility to the middle classes, and tea became a popular drink at the London coffee houses where people met to do business and discuss events of the day.
Peter stayed up late last night, so he drank a lot of coffee this morning to keep himself _____ in class.
Tony: May I have some more coffee, please?
The dinner was great indeed, but the coffee they served was quite different.

other.text: It was only served at coffee houses in London.

However, each time he lost a dove into the cold water, and—with the help of her competition, his coaches would lock him in a cage sister and two men—swam and pushed the boat for for days, feeding him only coffee and bread.

definition.zh_def: 咖啡是一種由咖啡豆製成的飲料，通常用熱水沖泡，具有提神的效果。
definition.en_def: Coffee is a beverage made from roasted coffee beans, typically brewed with hot water, known for its stimulating effects.
definition.example: I like to start my day with a cup of coffee.
